name: GammaSpeed (Very early alpha)
description:
In this game, the concept is that there is no speed limit. Wich means, you can keep gaining momentum forever, and jump around a stage.

Controls: w, a, s, d = normal movement

space = jump, and also gain a burst of speed, wich can be stacked, but rapidly drops if you're on the bround.

shift = if you're in the air, it makes you gain momentum, but you can remove this extra momentum by pressing shift on the ground.

r = restart

Alt-f4 = quit game

DISCLAIMER: This game is still in very early development, please note that this game is very far from complete and this release says very little about the final product. I would love to hear you thoughts on the controls and stuff.
